entity.name: Hillary Clinton
entity.description: Former First Lady of the United States Hillary Clinton

text:
@HillaryClinton Re Coronavirus
Please let everyone know that there is a lung scan that shows what the virus looks like in your lungs. I don't know why they're not telling everybody this it was on the BBC World News. No 48-hour wait.
